original: intros l1 l2 H H0. unfold sorted in H. induction l1 as [|e es IH]. - simpl. apply Nat.le_0_l. - simpl. intros. apply Nat.max_le_compat_l. apply IH. + intros e' Hin. apply H, or_introl, Hin. + apply in_or_app, or_intror, eq_refl. + apply in_or_app, or_intror, eq_refl. + apply H in H1. lia.
